trans-unit.source: Represents information about a SOAP fault that is specified in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 表示有关中指定的 SOAP 错误的信息<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can get a collection of FaultContractInfo objects by accessing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过访问获取的 FaultContractInfo 对象的集合<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FaultContractInfo class exposes the action of the SOAP fault and the detail type that is serialized into the SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: FaultContractInfo 类公开 SOAP 错误并序列化到 SOAP 错误的详细信息类型的操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo"></xref> class that uses the specified action and detail type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo"></xref>类，该类使用指定的操作和详细信息类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new FaultContractInfo from the `action` and `detail`.
The action of the SOAP fault.
The detail type that is serialized as the SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: 序列化为 SOAP 错误详细信息的详细信息类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SOAP fault action value.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SOAP 错误操作的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object that is serialized as the SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: 序列化为 SOAP 错误详细信息的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that represents the serialized SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>表示序列化的 SOAP 错误详细信息。</xref:System.Type>
